channel.title: Geth on VS tech corner
channel.description: Recent content in Geth on VS tech corner

item.title: Ethereum dev environment
item.description: Part 1 - Setup your ethereum node There are many ways you can setup a node to dev an Ethereum dapp. You can use the live network: not advisable obviously for cost and speed reasons. You can use the test network: not advisable for speed reasons. You can use a testchain set up with Geth: easy but a bit tedious as you need to mine. You can the ethereum testrpc: easiest!
